title: Zaza Pachulia
snippet: Following his retirement from a 16-year NBA playing career, Zaza Pachulia joined the Golden State Warriors in August 2019 as a consultant for both basketball and business operations.[2] In this capacity, he provided insights drawn from his on-court ...
